channel.title: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]
channel.description: Well is there any way? I am ftp but if I want I can get meber..oh and I'm starting off with a level 60 pure no money making skills or money or items what so ever ^^. Thanks!

item.title: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

A way that I’m using at the moment (takes time) would be to buy 1k Oak logs, turn them into planks (costs 250k for all) then sell them for 510 ea, bingo 510k.

Read full topic
item.source: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]

item.title: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:47, topic:178353”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=239337.msg2053929#msg2053929 date=1203056123]

[quote author=Taharok link=topic=239337.msg2052525#msg2052525 date=1202983290]

Hellhounds for level 3s and I have no recommendation for level 2s. Frankly, they really aren’t worth it.

Yeah exe626, clue scrolls are fun. I do use zybez and runehq when I get one to speed things up, but they are still fun. And on top of those old rewards (robin and ranger boots), they added 3rd age which is extremely rare and expensive. Full third age melee set (which is 4 pieces) is 140m. It also “one step up” from dragon armor, requires level 65 defense, and is insanely powerful in defense. It also actually looks good.
[/quote]You are yet a bastard but still very helpful. Unbelievable.

I am the youngest person in my family of six people smartass.
[/quote]And this interests me why? I have 4 brothers and 1sister big whoop.

Err, learn what swears actually mean before calling people them. Or better yet, don’t call people them at all. You make yourself look like a jackass when you do, not cool like you think.[/quote]Ok, what ever you say.

Read full topic
item.source: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]

And on top of those old rewards (robin and ranger boots), they added 3rd age which is extremely rare and expensive. Full third age melee set (which is 4 pieces) is 140m. It also “one step up” from dragon armor, requires level 65 defense, and is insanely powerful in defense. It also actually looks good.
[/quote]You are yet a bastard but still very helpful. Unbelievable.

I am the youngest person in my family of six people smartass.
[/quote]And this interests me why? I have 4 brothers and 1sister big whoop.[/quote]

Err, learn what swears actually mean before calling people them. Or better yet, don’t call people them at all. You make yourself look like a jackass when you do, not cool like you think.

@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:38, topic:178353”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=239337.msg2051970#msg2051970 date=1202964888]
Ah treasure trails. My favorite pass time in the game of Runescape. After Robin/Ranger items skyrocketed it prices, I made a killing off of Lv.3 scrolls.
[/quote]
Scrolls are easy to do, and there fun. Though I never got anything good from them cept 250k-300k.

I have no idea to tell what levels they are.

You can tell by what you kill is what you get.[/quote]So can you tell me what to kill for level 2 and 3 scrolls?

item.title: Any new way to make money or any good way? [Pics]
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:27, topic:178353”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=239337.msg2050396#msg2050396 date=1202884090]

[quote author=pk4pk link=topic=239337.msg2050231#msg2050231 date=1202880929]

1 - 99 hunter

30M+ cash at 99

time to get: 1-4 weeks
[/quote]I dont really think I’m going to spend such a long time on a skill that A. all it will give me is 30mil B. it’s boring C.I will be to lasy to get 30mil with it again

lols ok maybe range iron drags, you get a chance of visage. jsut stand 2 steps away from them so they can’t melee, use shield + antifire pots and you cant get hurt (no prayer needed)

Why irons? If you are maging or ranging, you do steels. Meleeing is for irons.

Do you think his stats can melee irons?

You sir, have missed my point completely.
[/quote]I’d bet 10$ on that ^^

No I understood your point your point is if you are going to mage or range any metal dragon it should be steel. Iron is for meleeing.

@pk4pk
you just lost $10 fuckwit.

Exactly, I said nothing about him doing irons. I think he should mage or range steels so that his chance for a visage could increase dramatically.

If I macro the next day my account will be banned, I’m thinking of getting a good 69 levels in fishing and fish sharks.

If you haven’t fished sharks before, don’t. They are very slow. If anything, do monkfish (you need to do the Slug Menace quest which is actually a pretty easy quest [if you are a quester]). Monkfish give near the same experience in fishing and cooking as sharks, burn once in a while (I suggest getting the cooking gauntlets from The Family Crest quest as well) and fish nearly as fast as lobsters. They also sell (I believe) 300 or 350 each. It is totally worth it just for the experience as well.

Another good way of making money is doing treasure trails. If you have done the regicide quest and have a decent strength level (and 60+ attack), invest in a dragon halberd and go kill hellhounds near ardougne (I think you need to start the temple of ikov quest first). Otherwise, kill the hellhounds in 50 wilderness (ardougne lever teleport to mage arena). Good luck and happy money making.[/quote]
Well I got a scroll and I need some help with it. Heres a pic

Btw I’ve gotten some money the past few days.

Read full topic

1 - 99 hunter

time to get: 1-4 weeks
[/quote]I dont really think I’m going to spend such a long time on a skill that A. all it will give me is 30mil B. it’s boring C.I will be to lasy to get 30mil with it again

lols ok maybe range iron drags, you get a chance of visage. jsut stand 2 steps away from them so they can’t melee, use shield + antifire pots and you cant get hurt (no prayer needed)

Why irons? If you are maging or ranging, you do steels. Meleeing is for irons.

Do you think his stats can melee irons?

You sir, have missed my point completely.
[/quote]I’d bet 10$ on that ^^

No I understood your point your point is if you are going to mage or range any metal dragon it should be steel. Iron is for meleeing.

@pk4pk
you just lost $10 fuckwit.[/quote]

Exactly, I said nothing about him doing irons. I think he should mage or range steels so that his chance for a visage could increase dramatically.

pk4pk:

If I macro the next day my account will be banned, I’m thinking of getting a good 69 levels in fishing and fish sharks.

If you haven’t fished sharks before, don’t. They are very slow. If anything, do monkfish (you need to do the Slug Menace quest which is actually a pretty easy quest [if you are a quester]). Monkfish give near the same experience in fishing and cooking as sharks, burn once in a while (I suggest getting the cooking gauntlets from The Family Crest quest as well) and fish nearly as fast as lobsters. They also sell (I believe) 300 or 350 each. It is totally worth it just for the experience as well.

Another good way of making money is doing treasure trails. If you have done the regicide quest and have a decent strength level (and 60+ attack), invest in a dragon halberd and go kill hellhounds near ardougne (I think you need to start the temple of ikov quest first). Otherwise, kill the hellhounds in 50 wilderness (ardougne lever teleport to mage arena). Good luck and happy money making.

Read full topic
